channel.title: Entertainment on The Hydrant
channel.description: Recent content in Entertainment on The Hydrant

item.title: Casa Bonita
item.description:
Welcome to a new section of the blog, the Weekends section. These entries will cover things that we do as a family on the weekends. From hikes to restaurants to whatever else. Since we’re new to the area, most things we do here are new to us!

Casa Bonita

Last weekend’s destination was Casa Bonita, “The Most Entertaining Restaurant In The World.”

That’s their tag line, anyway. We shall see.
